name: Electrician Survival
description:
WASD to move. Avoid enemies that are activated. Survive as long as you can.

The game features 7 unique enemies which all have different attack patterns:

Floater: Slowly moves towards your position

Rook: Moves horizontally, then vertically, then horizontally, etc.

Hopper: Jumps towards your x position

Teleporter: Locks on to your position and teleports after a delay

Dart: Dashes in your direction and is locked in that direction until it hits a wall

Gunship: Launches explosives towards you

Sniper: Aims at you, locks on, fires
